message: I'm excited to offer you this unique product at a competitive price. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of the product, $12,000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for it. Let me know what you think.

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can see that you're willing to pay $10,500, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counteroffer at $11,250. Let's see if we can meet in the middle.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. $11,250 is still a bit high for me. I'm happy to meet you in the middle, but I can only go up to $10,750.  Let's see if we can finalize a deal.

I can see you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $10,750, but I'll throw in a small concession. I'll sell the product to you for $10,800. Let's see if we can wrap up the deal.
Alice, we're getting very close.  I'm willing to go up to $10,700.  It's my final offer.  Let's finalize this deal.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I can see you're really interested in the product. However, I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $10,700, but I'll throw in an additional concession. I'll sell the product to you for $10,900. Let's see if we can finally reach an agreement.
